title: Program for Improving Basic Math Problem-Solving Skills Through Remote Role-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A course for novice professionals (medical/legal/technical) to strengthen foundational mathematical competencies via smartphone-based real-time video conferencing, with formative assessment-centered feedback

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative problem-solving processes through role allocation (problem solver, verifier, explainer)
Learners can solve given math problems (fractions, ratio problems, etc.) with over 80% accuracy through role-based collaborative learning
Learners can revise and improve their problem-solving strategies at least once based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
